Class MenuItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • classes.SaleItem
      • classes.MenuItem

  • public class MenuItem
extends SaleItem
    Represents individual (Food) Menu Item
    A MenuItem is a SaleItem, with MenuType
    Author:
    Kailing

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  MenuItem.MenuType
      Represent type of (Food) Menu Item
      Can be a Main Dish, Side Dish, Drink, Dessert etc
